entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
